verses.verse: Then <WG5119> was Jesus <WG2424> led <WG321> up of the spirit <WG4151> into <WG1519> the wilderness <WG2048> to be tempted <WG3985> of the devil. <WG1228>
And when he had fasted <WG3522> forty <WG5062> days <WG2250> and forty <WG5062> nights, <WG3571> he was afterward <WG5305> an hungered. <WG3983>

And when the tempter <WG3985> came <WG4334> to him, he said, <WG2036> If <WG1487> you be the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> command <WG2036> that these <WG3778> stones <WG3037> be made <WG1096> bread. <WG740>

But he answered <WG611> and said, <WG2036> It is written, <WG1125> Man <WG444> shall not live <WG2198> by bread <WG740> alone, <WG3441> but by every <WG3956> word <WG4487> that proceeds <WG1607> out of the mouth <WG4750> of God. <WG2316>
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> takes <WG3880> him up into <WG1519> the holy <WG40> city, <WG4172> and sets <WG2476> him on <WG1909> a pinnacle <WG4419> of the temple, <WG2411>

And said <WG3004> to him, If <WG1487> you be the Son <WG5207> of God, <WG2316> cast <WG906> yourself <WG4572> down: <WG2736> for it is written, <WG1125> He shall give his angels <WG32> charge <WG1781> concerning <WG4012> you: and in their hands <WG5495> they shall bear <WG142> you up, lest <WG3379> at <WG3379> any <WG3379> time <WG3379> you dash <WG4350> your foot <WG4228> against <WG4314> a stone. <WG3037>
Jesus <WG2424> said <WG5346> to him, It is written <WG1125> again, <WG3825> You shall not tempt <WG1598> the Lord <WG2962> your God. <WG2316>

Again, <WG3825> the devil <WG1228> takes <WG3880> him up into <WG1519> an exceeding <WG3029> high <WG5308> mountain, <WG3735> and shows <WG1166> him all <WG3956> the kingdoms <WG932> of the world, <WG2889> and the glory <WG1391> of them;
And said <WG3004> to him, All <WG3956> these <WG5023> things will I give <WG1325> you, if <WG1437> you will fall <WG4098> down <WG4098> and worship <WG4352> me.

Then <WG5119> said <WG3004> Jesus <WG2424> to him, Get <WG5217> you hence, <WG5217> Satan: <WG4567> for it is written, <WG1125> You shall worship <WG4352> the Lord <WG2962> your God, <WG2316> and him only <WG3441> shall you serve. <WG3000>
Then <WG5119> the devil <WG1228> leaves <WG863> him, and, behold, <WG2400> angels <WG32> came <WG4334> and ministered <WG1247> to him.
Now <WG1161> when Jesus <WG2424> had heard <WG191> that John <WG2491> was cast <WG3860> into prison, <WG3860> he departed <WG402> into <WG1519> Galilee; <WG1056>

And leaving <WG2641> Nazareth, <WG3478> he came <WG2064> and dwelled <WG2730> in Capernaum, <WG2584> which <WG3588> is on the sea <WG3864> coast, <WG3864> in the borders <WG3725> of Zabulon <WG2194> and Nephthalim: <WG3508>
That it might be fulfilled <WG4137> which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> by Esaias <WG2268> the prophet, <WG4396> saying, <WG3004>

The land <WG1093> of Zabulon, <WG2194> and the land <WG1093> of Nephthalim, <WG3508> by the way <WG3598> of the sea, <WG2281> beyond <WG4008> Jordan, <WG2446> Galilee <WG1056> of the Gentiles; <WG1484>

The people <WG2992> which <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in darkness <WG4655> saw <WG1492> great <WG3173> light; <WG5457> and to them which <WG3588> sat <WG2521> in the region <WG5561> and shadow <WG4639> of death <WG2288> light <WG5457> is sprung <WG393> up.
From that time <WG5119> Jesus <WG2424> began <WG756> to preach, <WG2784> and to say, <WG3004> Repent: <WG3340> for the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is at <WG1448> hand. <WG1448>

And Jesus, <WG2424> walking <WG4043> by the sea <WG2281> of Galilee, <WG1056> saw <WG1492> two <WG1417> brothers, <WG80> Simon <WG4613> called <WG3004> Peter, <WG4074> and Andrew <WG406> his brother, <WG80> casting <WG906> a net <WG293> into <WG1519> the sea: <WG2281> for they were fishers. <WG231>
And he said <WG3004> to them, Follow <WG1205> <WG3694> me, and I will make <WG4160> you fishers <WG231> of men. <WG444>
And they straightway <WG2112> left <WG863> their nets, <WG1350> and followed <WG190> him.

And going <WG4260> on from there, <WG1564> he saw <WG1492> other <WG243> two <WG1417> brothers, <WG80> James <WG2385> the son of Zebedee, <WG2199> and John <WG2491> his brother, <WG80> in a ship <WG4143> with Zebedee <WG2199> their father, <WG3962> mending <WG2675> their nets; <WG1350> and he called <WG2564> them.
And they immediately <WG2112> left <WG863> the ship <WG4143> and their father, <WG3962> and followed <WG190> him.

And Jesus <WG2424> went <WG4013> about <WG4013> all <WG3650> Galilee, <WG1056> teaching <WG1321> in their synagogues, <WG4864> and preaching <WG2784> the gospel <WG2098> of the kingdom, <WG932> and healing <WG2323> all <WG3956> manner of sickness <WG3554> and all <WG3956> manner of disease <WG3119> among <WG1722> the people. <WG2992>

And his fame <WG189> went <WG565> throughout <WG1519> all <WG3650> Syria: <WG4947> and they brought <WG4374> to him all <WG3956> sick <WG2192> <WG2560> people that were taken <WG4912> with divers <WG4164> diseases <WG3554> and torments, <WG931> and those <WG3588> which were possessed <WG1139> with devils, <WG1139> and those which were lunatic, <WG4583> and those that had the palsy; <WG3885> and he healed <WG2323> them.

And there followed <WG190> him great <WG4183> multitudes <WG3793> of people from Galilee, <WG1056> and from Decapolis, <WG1179> and from Jerusalem, <WG2414> and from Judaea, <WG2449> and from beyond <WG4008> Jordan. <WG2446>
